content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all sizes doll through adult x-large in one printable file without advertisements when i caught my first glimpse of lion brand s new tape yarn rewind i knew right away that it would be perfect to make myself a new sunhat and beach bag with summer quickly approaching and the sun s rays getting hotter by the day i decided to design a new sunhat first don t fret the beach bag will be along soon **sizes included ** 18 doll baby toddler child adult small/medium adult large/x-large lion brand rewind yarn is the perfect yarn for this design as i did not need to add wire to the brim to keep its shape **yarn notes & substitutions ** lion brand rewind tape yarn was used for the samples in the pattern although it is classified as a 5/bulky yarn because it is a tape yarn it works up more similarly to a lighter worsted/4 so keep that in mind if you re looking for substitutions testers had great luck using worsted weight/4 cotton yarns such as lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton hat is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted
